Articles.Content: Hi people of the kerbal space program forums, I'm WechyPichu, and I am new here. I use the demo version of the kerbal space program, so, if you want to see anything I've made, It'll be outdated.

Hi WechyPichu, welcome to the community

The demo is still a lot of fun and many players here would be reminded of how they started with KSP, so show us your stuff WechyPichu, we'd like to see it.

Welcome to the forums WechyPichu.

We can still see your stuff and eventually try and get the new version as it has new planets to explore.

Good luck playing KSP.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!
